explains: adv. 和蔼地；仁慈地；雅致地

sentences.cn: 她落落大方地接受了我们的邀请。

sentences.en: Hospitality at the presidential guest house was graciously declined.
sentences.cn: 总统套房里的款待被婉言谢绝了。

sentences.en: "There, there," said Toad, graciously and affably, "never mind; think no more about it."
sentences.cn: “好啦，好啦，”托德温文尔雅、殷勤地说，“没关系，别再想它了。”
